title: Vehicle licensing
tagline: Vehicle licensing covers tax disc relicensing and SORN (Statutory Off Road Notification), two services provided by DVLA. Does not include first registrations.

modules.title: Tax disc and SORN – breakdown
modules.description: Vehicle licensing applications per month broken down by service
info: Shows the monthly number of successful applications to renew a tax disc and the number of SORNs received.

modules.title: Digital, Post Office and DVLA centre – breakdown
modules.description: Vehicle licensing per month broken down by digital, Post Office and DVLA centre applications
info: The number of successful tax disc renewals and SORNs received, broken down by digital, Post Office and DVLA centre applications
Digital and automated phone: applications made online or using the automated telephone service
Post Office: applications made at a Post Office branch
DVLA centre: applications made at local DVLA centres
